Ingredients.3: 1 salt and ground black pepper to taste

Directions.1: Preheat an air fryer to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

Directions.2: Slice polenta into long, thin slices resembling french fries.

Directions.3: Spray the bottom of the basket with cooking spray. Place 1/2 of the polenta fries in the basket and lightly mist the tops with cooking spray. Season with salt and pepper.

Directions.4: Cook in the preheated air fryer for 10 minutes. Flip the fries with a spatula and cook until crispy, about 5 minutes longer. Transfer fries to a paper towel-lined plate. Repeat with remaining half of fries.
